labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: mouse only shows on screenshare when on monitor 2
data.expected_result: Mouse should show when on monitor 1 (the monitor being screenshared)
data.short_description: When recording first monitor, mouse only captured when on second
data.steps_to_repro: - Start up a call - Turn on screensharing and record monitor 1 - Put mouse on monitor 1, see if it shows up, then try putting it on monitor 2 "
